document_data.mainbody:
Lord Protector Talaric Daoran was a member of the royal House Daoran of Phlan and the ruler of the city-state during the midâ€“15 century DR. 
He was the son of Phlans first monarch Cvaal and the father of Anivar, the last member of the Daoran dynasty.
In the , Talaric broke the treaty his father had formed with the dark fey of the Quivering Forest, by directing loggers to start cutting down its trees. He vanished from Valjevo Castle the very next day and was never seen again.
